description:
The 9to5Linux Weekly Roundup for July 21st, 2024, brings news about Blender 4.2, Audacity 3.6, OpenMandriva Lx 24.07, NVIDIA 560 shipping with open-source kernel modules, VirtualBox 7.0.20, KDE Plasma 6.1.3, GNU Linux-Libre 6.10, KaOS Linux 2024.07, as well as all the latest distro and software releases.

The post 9to5Linux Weekly Roundup: July 21st, 2024 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: 9to5Linux Weekly Roundup: July 21st, 2024
